import decode from'jwt-decode';class AuthService{getProfile(){return decode(this.getToken());}loggedIn(){// Checks if there is a saved token and it's still valid
const token=this.getToken();return!!token&&!this.isTokenExpired(token);}isTokenExpired(token){try{const decoded=decode(token);if(decoded.exp<Date.now()/1000){return true;}else return false;}catch(err){return false;}}getToken(){// Retrieves the user token from localStorage
return localStorage.getItem('id_token');}login(idToken){// Saves user token to localStorage
localStorage.setItem('id_token',idToken);window.location.assign('/');}logout(){// Clear user token and profile data from localStorage
localStorage.removeItem('id_token');// this will reload the page and reset the state of the application
window.location.assign('/');}}export default new AuthService();
